author: Maria Lichty

ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, (seeds removed and chopped)
1 red bell pepper, (seeds removed and chopped)
instructions:
In a large bowl, combine the mango, jicama, cucumber, red pepper, scallions, cilantro, and mint.
Squeeze fresh lime juice over the salad and toss. Sprinkle with salt and Tajin, if using. Toss again.
Serve and enjoy!
instructions_list: In a large bowl, combine the mango, jicama, cucumber, red pepper, scallions, cilantro, and mint.
Squeeze fresh lime juice over the salad and toss. Sprinkle with salt and Tajin, if using. Toss again.
title: Mango Salad
description: Mango Salad- ripe juicy mangoes with jicama, cucumber, red pepper, mint, cilantro, fresh lime juice, and a sprinkle of Tajin. This refreshing simple salad is perfect for summertime or anytime!
